EmailTemplate.description: Alert to inform that a new solution has been review - is it applicable for your region?
EmailTemplate.name: IDFS_New solution - Reviewed
EmailTemplate.subject: New {!Solution.Language__c} solution has been published - is it applicable in your region?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
The following Solution has been published in the knowledge database:
"{!Solution.SolutionNumber}" "{!Solution.SolutionName}" "{!Solution.SolutionNote}"
Is this solution applicable in your region? If so, you will have to categorise the solution accordingly:
In the Solution page ({!Solution.Link} ) click on 'Categorise' Select the appropriate Categories Save
Thank you for being part of building the knowledge database!
Your system administrator
